name: Midnight Train (Misterjhon223)
description:
Midnight Train

I hope you enjoy the game, tell me what you think of the story game Let's explore a little bit of this strange train

game controls

  A - D = walk

 Shift + A - D =  run

  S = chrouch (only idle play)

  W = get up (only chrouch  play )

   W = hide  (only idle play)

    S = unhide  (only hide play)

  J = shot (only idle play)

   SPACE = jump (only idle play)

  SPACE = jump run (only run play)

   W = climb up (when snapped on an edge )

   X = slide (only run play)

   E = active climb in stairs ( press A or D to get out stairs)

  A - D = to release grab     ( in control pad use triggers to release )

Backspace will reset layout if you die ( be careful with the use of reset it can  disturb you if you don’t use it after the death animation )

by: Mister Jhon 

Infinity Dreams
